Hello! I’m Mark Reeves, a full stack web developer. Outside of technology circles I describe myself as a general contractor for website, web application, and email projects. I’ve worked with a wide array of technologies and industries for over 20 years, and can help you scope, budget, and realize your project goals on time and on budget. I support most projects directly, from interaction design through development and launch. On larger projects I can pull together a team with specialized skillsets and serve as hands-on project manager. I’ve supported clients remotely for over thirteen years as Clearbold, LLC.

Spring, 2020

COVID-19 UPDATE

I’m concerned about local businesses, organizations, and services—members of our communities—surviving this crisis. If there are viable options to support your customers or move operations online, I can help you identify those. Support for online payments, e-commerce, taking to-go orders, posting daily offerings or service updates; these are all things that can be spun up relatively quickly to help you adapt to a new reality. I can also help implement tools to support remote teams.

Installment payment plans may be available.

I’m experienced in pivoting to support a broad range of capabilities. Over the past few years, Clearbold has:

  • Worked with Vermont-based Journey North to launch a new publishing/editorial platform on Drupal; undertake a significant hosting migration; modernize their Citizen Science database and online maps; upgrade website security protocols.
  • Helped a high-end, New England caterer—a long-time client—evaluate moving to Salesforce for CRM, establish email marketing and marketing automation campaigns, and launch a new e-commerce venture for online catering orders.
  • Released multiple Craft CMS plugins supporting integration with Campaign Monitor for email marketing & marketing automation, and leveraged those plugins in multiple Clearbold client projects.
  • Launched 4 new client sites on Craft CMS in 2019 alone.

If that’s the sort of versatility and support your business or organization needs right now, let’s talk and see what we can work out. Please get in touch by email.
